data.Name: Exponential Roadmap
data.Tagline: The Exponential Roadmap highlights the 36 solutions that can scale exponentially to halve Greenhouse Gas Emissions by 2030 worldwide.
data.About:
Scaling of solutions comes from sharp policy, from climate leadership by companies and cities and from a finance and technology shift towards green solutions with exponential potential.

The roadmap shows how we can build a stronger, more resilient and future-proof global economy and increase human prosperity and health â€“ within the planetary boundaries.
